review.title: “Unit Manager”
review.pros: Pros – Trabajo de horario flexible, orientado a metas, autofinanciado y de gran exigencia
review.cons: Cons – Lack of education, few opportunities for advancement, low employability, low participation in the projections, strategically misaligned.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – requires greater attention to its operating units, require an integration of units for screening, lack mystique.
